publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Mat. Lownes; and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Bishops head,

notesStmt.note: A translation of STC 12814, which is a reply to: Becanus, Martinus. Dissidium Anglicanum de primatu regis.
Expanded to include a reply to Becanus, Martinus. Examen concordiae anglicanae.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
